s177.literal: Granted the title of Marquis for surrendering as a Xiongnu chancellor, 530 households.
s177.idiomatic: Enfeoffed as Marquis for surrendering as a Xiongnu chancellor, with 530 households.

s178.literal: Enfeoffed on the guisi day of the tenth month, in the fifth year, convicted of plotting rebellion and fleeing to the Xiongnu, sentenced to execution.
s178.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the guisi day of the tenth month. In the fifth year, convicted of plotting rebellion and fleeing to the Xiongnu, and sentenced to execution.

s184.literal: With the rank of Colonel, attacked the Xiongnu, captured more than 1,000 heads, with General attacked Nanyue, pacified Longxi, merits granted the title of Marquis.
s184.idiomatic: As Colonel, attacked the Xiongnu and captured over 1,000 heads. As General, attacked Nanyue and pacified Longxi—for these merits was granted the title of Marquis.

s185.literal: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
s185.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).

s196.literal: With the rank of General of Light Chariots, attacked the Xiongnu, captured many, merits granted the title of Marquis.
s196.idiomatic: As General of Light Chariots, attacked the Xiongnu and captured many prisoners—for these merits was granted the title of Marquis.

s197.literal: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
s197.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).

s206.literal: Went out from Youbeiping as General of Valiant Cavalry, attacked the Xiongnu, achieved merits in Longxi, Anding, Beidi, Shangjun, and Henan, granted the title of Marquis.
s206.idiomatic: As General of Valiant Cavalry, went out from Youbeiping and attacked the Xiongnu, achieving merits in Longxi, Anding, Beidi, Shangjun, and Henan—and was granted the title of Marquis.

s207.literal: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
s207.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).

s214.literal: Attacked the Xiongnu as Cavalry Commandant, beheaded and captured more than 2,000, granted the title of Marquis.
s214.idiomatic: As Cavalry Commandant, attacked the Xiongnu and took more than 2,000 heads and captives—for these merits was granted the title of Marquis.

s215.literal: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
s215.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).

s224.literal: With the rank of Colonel, attacked the Xiongnu, captured more than 1,500, granted the title of Marquis.
s224.idiomatic: As Colonel, attacked the Xiongnu and captured over 1,500 prisoners—for these merits was granted the title of Marquis.

s225.literal: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
s225.idiomatic: Enfeoffed in the sixth year of Yuanshuo (123 BCE).
